title: Hyderabad to Hampi Heritage Trail
overview: Step back in time at the UNESCO World Heritage site of Hampi, the ruins of the Vijayanagara Empire.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Sunset
itinerary.desc: Arrive in Hampi, check-in, sunset view from Hemakuta Hill.

itinerary.title: Full Day Ruins
itinerary.desc: Explore the Royal Enclosure and riverside temples.

itinerary.title: Anegundi & Departure
itinerary.desc: Visit the monkey temple and depart for Hyderabad.
